name: n8n-nodes-base.plivo
semantic_context: Send SMS/MMS messages or make phone calls

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

from.name: from
from.description: Caller ID for the call to make
from.ai_hint: Caller ID for the call to make

to.name: to
to.description: Phone number to make the call to
to.ai_hint: Phone number to make the call to

media_urls.name: media_urls
media_urls.description: Comma-separated list of media URLs of the files from your file server
media_urls.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

answer_method.name: answer_method
answer_method.description: HTTP verb to be used when invoking the Answer URL
answer_method.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

answer_url.name: answer_url
answer_url.description: URL to be invoked by Plivo once the call is answered. It should return the XML to handle the call once answered.
answer_url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'sms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'from'
IF resource == 'sms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'to'
IF operation == 'send' AND resource == 'sms' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'mms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'from'
IF operation == 'send' AND resource == 'mms' THEN SHOW parameter 'to'
IF resource == 'mms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'mms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'media_urls'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'make' THEN SHOW parameter 'from'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'make' THEN SHOW parameter 'to'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'make' THEN SHOW parameter 'answer_method'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'make' THEN SHOW parameter 'answer_url'
